name: Music Box
tagline: This is a simple music playing box for your enjoyment.
body:
## Features

The Music Box features a simple interface using GUI. The Music Box was programmed in python, and is open source.

![](http://i.imgur.com/Bt1OyTS.png)

### The Coders

The people who have contributed greatly to the Music Box are:

* Mrmeguyme (https://Youtube.com/c/Mrmeguyme)

## Installation

### Libraries / Python

The following libraries are required for the music box:

* Mutagen

* Pygame

These libraries can be installed through a few simple commands.

    pip install mutagen

    pip install pygame

These commands require python, Which can be downloaded from https://www.python.org/downloads/.
Make sure Python 3 is downloaded, as it is required for the program to run correctly.

### Program Time

Next, download the program, and extract it to a folder of your choosing.
Run either setup.bat or setup.sh depending on whether you run a windows machine or a linux machine.
This will prompt you to press any key, which when pressed will execute the program.

When executing the program from now on, execute it from run.bat.

### Troubleshooting

if the program won't start, try typing

    python Main.py build

into your command line to build the program.

## Contact

If you have any problems with the music box, feel free to talk to me (Mrmeguyme) directly on the discord widget below:

<iframe src="https://discordapp.com/widget?id=250442785147191306&theme=dark" width="350" height="500" allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0"></iframe>
